description:
Zip Code Explorer's main function works around zip codes and the information related to them...

You can look-up a specific zip code or find out the zip code for a particular city. Once you narrow the search down to a zip code, you can then research all kinds of useful things about it such as homes for sale, jobs in the area, area crime rates & sex offenders, demographic information, government information, environmental information, local weather and maps, and more!

There are 3 ways to search by; Zip Code, City, or your current GPS location!

The database is constantly being updated and more and more resources are added almost daily!

This is a great tool if traveling or if you are planning on moving to an area!

You can share your findings via Facebook, SMS and Email!

The Zip Code Explorer is your one-stop zip code research resource!

(This is a FREE 14-day Trial version)
